original_title: SJB working committee decides to take action against defectors
original_body_lines: Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) working committee which met today decided to vest powers with party leader Sajith Premadasa to take action against those who defy the party line.
“The working committee has decided to consider defying the party line as a grave offense,” a statement from the party said.
Also, it has been decided that the SJB will form a grand alliance with Premadasa as the leader to contest the next presidential election. (Yohan Perera)
